narrative:
This is a focused inspection limited to the red long haired Dachshund cited under veterinary care section 2.40 b 2 as
a direct non compliance on the February 18, 2016.  Licensee provided documentation that the dog was taken to a
licensed veterinarian.  
Focused inspection and interview conducted by Dr. Michael Tygart VMO and R. Whiteley  ACI with the facility
representative.
